Ward–Tap an artifact. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player taps an artifact.)[/i]
[i]Song of Fire[/i] – Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, Brady, Daunting Priest deals 2 damage to each opponent.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Brady, Daunting Priest attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, you gain 2 life.
